tool_description: Back-end infrastructure for building investment apps. Build your MVP for free. Scale it to full-featured app, when you have real traction. All you need to do is customize your front-end.
name: Tradematic Cloud
title: Tradematic Cloud

api_list.name: /taskmanager/tasks-1
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tradematic-cloud.p.rapidapi.com/taskmanager/tasks"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tradematic-cloud.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
